content.p: By changing exactly one of either the {{a}}, {{b}}, {{c}}, or the inequality sign {{ineq}} in this problem, find a new inequality whose solution set is {{newsol}}.
Provide a step-by-step solution of your new inequality, and accompany your answer with a sketch of the solution set as a shaded portion of the real number line.
